tuv.seg: Teachers duty of care
Dualgais cúraim na múinteoirí

If a child has an accident in the school, in the schoolyard, on the way to school, on the school bus or while on a school trip, the question of whether or not the school or the teachers were negligent may arise

Má tharlaíonn timpiste do pháiste sa scoil, i gclós na scoile, ar an mbealach chuig an scoil, ar an mbus scoile nó ar thuras scoile d'fhéadfadh sé go nárdófaí ceist faoi cé acu an raibh an scoil nó na múinteoirí faillíoch nó nach raibh
There is no simple answer to the question of when the school may be liable
Níl freagra shímplí ar an gceist faoi cén uair a bhféadfadh scoil a bheith freagrach
Everything depends on the facts of the individual case
Braitheann gach rud ar na cúinsí a bhaineann le gach cás ann féin
Teachers' duty of care
Dualgas cúraim na múinteoirí
The general law of negligence provides that a person may be negligent if
De réir na ndlíthe ginearálta a bhaineann le faillí, d'fhéadfadh go mbeadh duine faillíoch:
• He/she owes a duty of care to the person injured and
• Má tá cúram air / uirthi i leith an duine atá gortaithe
• He/she did not carry out that duty to the legal standard required and
• Munar chomhlíon sé / sí an cúram sin go dtí an caighdeán dleathúil a bhí ag teastáil
• The person suffered damage as a result of the failure to observe the duty of care
• Má d'fhulaing an duine dochar de bharr nár comhlíonadh an dualgas cúraim
In any given case, the actual facts must be examined closely to see if all these elements are present
I ngach cás, caithfear na cúinsí féin a scrúdú go géar len a fháil amach an bhfuil na gnéithe seo ag baint leo
There is no doubt that teachers owe a duty of care to students
Is cinnte go bhfuil dualgas cúraim ar mhúinteoirí i leith scoláirí
When this duty starts, where it ends and precisely what constitutes a breach of duty are not nearly so clearcut
Níl na ceisteanna seo a leanas chomh soiléir sin áfach: cén uair a dtosaíonn an dualgas, cá gcríochnaíonn sé agus céard iad na cásanna go díreach ina mbíonn sárú an dualgais i gceist
The following general principles apply:
Seo a leanas na prionsabail ghinearálta:
• Teachers must take reasonable care to ensure that their students do not meet with foreseeable injury
• Caithfidh múinteoirí aire chiallmhar a thabhairt chun a chinntiú nach dtarlaíonn aon ghortú a mbeadh coinne leis, dá gcuid daltaí
They have a duty to protect the children against foreseeable risks of personal injury or harm
Tá sé de dhualgas orthu na páistí a chosaint ar aon chontúirt gortaithe pearsanta nó díobháil a mbeadh coinne leo
• The standard of care is that of a reasonably prudent parent
• Sé an caighdeán cúraim a mbeifí ag súil leis ná an caighdeán a bheadh ag tuismitheoir stuama go leor
The degree of care depends on such factors as the age of the students
Braitheann an méid cúram ar chúinsí ar nós aois na scoláirí
• There must be an effective system of supervision in operation in the school
• Caithfidh córas éifeachtach maoirseachta a bheith i bhfeidhm sa scoil
The duty of care applies while the students are on the school premises during school opening hours
Bíonn dualgas cúraim i gceist nuair a bhíonn daltaí ar áitreabh na scoile, i rith uaireanta oscailte na scoile
It may also apply if the students are present outside of official school hours, e.g., if they arrive early or leave late and the teacher/school has agreed to the students being present

D'fhéadfadh go mbeadh sé i gceist chomh maith má bhíonn scoláirí i láthair taobh amuigh de na huaireanta oifigiúla, mar shampla má thagann siad go luath nó má fhanann siad deireanach agus gur aontaigh an múinteoir/scoil leis na daltaí a bheith i láthair
The same duty of care applies if a teacher voluntarily supervises children
Bíonn an dualgas cúraim céanna i gceist má dhéanann múinteoir maoirseacht go deonach ar pháistí
Teachers are required to follow good standards and approved practice
Éilítear go gcleachtfadh múinteoirí deá chaighdeán agus cleachtais mholta
Risky classes and activities require a greater degree of supervision
Bíonn níos mó maoirseachta ag teastáil le haghaidh ranganna agus imeachtaí contúirteach
If goggles, protective clothing, etc., are supplied for certain activities, it is the teacher's duty to ensure that they are worn
Má tá gloiní cosanta agus éadaí cosanta curtha ar fáil le haghaidh imeachtaí éagsúla, tá sé de dhualgas ar an múinteoir a chinntiú go gcaitear iad
Teachers are not insurers and cannot be responsible for every accident in school hours
Ní árachóirí iad na múinteoirí agus ní féidir leo a bheith freagrach as gach timpiste a thárlaíonn i rith uaireanta scoile
The courts accept that some accidents will happen no matter how well supervision is carried out and, in such cases, the teacher/school cannot be held liable
Glacann na cúirteanna leis go dtarlóidh roinnt timpistí, is cuma cé chomh maith agus a bhíonn an mhaoirseacht agus i gcásanna mar seo ní féidir a rá go bhfuil an múinteoir / scoil freagrach
The Board of Management is vicariously liable for the negligence of its teachers
Tá an Bord Bainistíochta freagrach go hionadach as faillí a chuid múinteoirí
That means that the board is sued in such cases
Ciallaíonn sé sin go dtógtar cúis i gcoinne an Bhoird, i gcásanna mar seo
The board is obliged to have comprehensive insurance cover for the school
Tá dualgas ar an mBord árachas cuimsitheach a bheith ar an scoil
This insurance must cover public liability, negligence by staff or defects in the buildings
Caithfidh an tárachas seo freagracht poiblí, faillí fóirne nó máchail ar an bhfoirgneamh a chlúdú
The insurance policy must be available for inspection
Caithfidh an polasaí a bheith ar fáil le scrúdú
Some parents take out insurance to cover children against accidents at school that are not the responsibility of the school
Tógann roinnt tuismitheoirí árachas amach chun a gcuid páistí a chlúdú in aghaidh timpistí ar scoil nach bhfuil an scoil freagrach astu
Some schools encourage parents to do this
Molann cuid de na scoileanna do thuismitheoirí é seo a dhéanamh
This is entirely a matter of personal choice
Is rogha phearsanta amach is amach í seo
The general health services are available to children in the normal way if they suffer an injury at school
Tá fáil ag páistí ar na gnáth sheirbhísí sláinte má tharlaíonn gortú dóibh ar scoil
Safety standards in schools
Caighdeán Sábháilteachta i scoileanna
Schools are obliged to abide by the usual safety rules that apply to public buildings and the normal rules that apply to employee safety at work
Tá dualgas ar scoileanna clóigh leis na gnáth rialacha sábháilteachta a bhaineann le foirgnimh phoiblí agus leis na rialacha coiteanta a bhaineann le sábháilteacht fostaithe i mbun oibre
Schools are required to have a code of behaviour in relation to school discipline and bullying and teachers are obliged to behave in accordance with that code
Tá ar scoileanna cód iompair a bheith i bhfeidhm acu maidir le disciplín scoile agus bulaíocht agus tá ar mhúinteoirí iompar i gcomhréir leis an gcód sin
There are specific rules and guidelines for teachers if an issue of child abuse arises
Tá rialacha sonracha agus treoirlínte do mhúinteoirí ann má thagann saincheist de mhí-úsáid leanaí aníos
In general, teachers must be registered with the Teaching Council in order to be paid from public funds
Go ginearálta, ní mór do mhúinteoirí a bheith cláraithe leis an gComhairle Mhúinteoireachta go n-íocfar iad ó chistí poiblí
Complaints may lead to withdrawal of registration on a temporary or permanent basis
Má dhéantar gearáin, d’fhéadfaí clárúchán an mhúinteora a aistarraingt ar bhonn sealadach nó buan
The Teaching Council provides information about making a complaint to the Council about a registered teacher
Soláthraíonn an Chomhairle Mhúinteoireachta faisnéis faoi ghearán a dhéanamh leis an gComhairle faoi mhúinteoir cláraithe
Unless there are good and sufficient reasons, the Teaching Council will generally not look into a complaint unless school complaint or grievance procedures have been exhausted

Mura bhfuil cúiseanna maithe agus leordhóthanacha ann, is gnách nach bhfiosróidh an Chomhairle Mhúinteoireacht gearán murach go ndearnadh iarracht déileáil leis an ngearán trí na nósanna imeachta gearáin nó casaoide ar dtús
Good and sufficient reasons include where children or vulnerable adults are, or may be, at risk of harm
Áirítear le cúiseanna maithe agus leordhóthanacha cásanna ina bhfuil nó ina bhféadfadh leanaí nó daoine fásta leochaileacha a bheith i mbaol díobhála
